/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with various signs and advertisements, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The street itself is teeming with life, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
